snippet.title: Sunshine Arcade 2 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Mario Arcade 2 is a mod for Super Mario Sunshine that contains 96 unique levels that are similar to the secret levels in sunshine. 48 of those levels are from the original.

Also in each level, there is a blue coin as an extra challenge. Don't worry about collecting them all, since they aren't worth anything. You can always collect them at the end.

Special Thanks:
Noki Doki - Helping(more like doing for me) a TON with the ASM stuff.
Shibboleet - For making a tool called corona and also helping with ASM
arookas - Helping me understand the collision format.
miluaces - Making the SMS bin editor, which is the backbone of this hack.
Yoshi2/Gamma - For making SuperBMD, which is used to import custom models
google_cheese - Testing on console
Cyber- Making the banner
All the other members of the sunshine modding community for teachning me how to do this stuff.

This link works on both dolphin and console now:
Download links:

For dolphin - https://mega.nz/#!EdVwnAaA!TyzdLkvZCyPsNhDlLfVoI7b2Vp98z3vwYJ_U1FFCZLA
For console - https://mega.nz/file/JUMhHaDa#fSIrInTjlMWOCagnzMihinbSMoQb0JbfLBIsMmGQBkI

Join our Sunshine Modding Discord:  cWrynTW

Technical details:

ARCADE 1 SAVE FILES are not compatible with this game. You need to make a new save file in arcade 2.

Gecko code to skip the first 48 levels:
04299754 38630007
040032e4 38840007
04003310 39EF0008
(Gecko code is not compatible with the level select at the end of the game but the rest of the game works.)

This game has been tested by me and google_cheese but there may still be some bugs and problems. Please tell me if you find any and I will do my best to fix them.

The story with console compatibility: So in the video I said that google_cheese tested the game to be console compatible, but actually what he tested was a beta version that is 99% the same game as this one, it just doesn't include the level select at the end. Well it turns out the 1% difference between that beta build and the full release breaks the game on console. It turns out the problem was that I set the game ID to SMSA01 which broke the game. Thanks to yoshi2 I found this out. I will leave the link to the beta here just for the sake of it. DOWNLOAD LINK ABOVE IS CONSOLE COMPATIBLE.

Here is a link to the beta build: http://www.mediafire.com/file/s2jc19rl9mja2po/Arcade_2_Beta.rar/file
This rar is password protected, the password is: googlecheesebetatest
